title: OpenStrand - AI-Enhanced Personal Knowledge Management System
description: Transform your data into interactive visual stories with OpenStrand. Offline-ready analytics blend with optional generative AI overlays.

title: OpenStrand Landing - Guided Visual Storytelling Platform
description: Explore the OpenStrand marketing hub: offline-first analytics, guided storytelling, optional AI overlays, and a built-in admin console for Stripe & LemonSqueezy telemetry.

title: Pricing - OpenStrand
description: Compare OpenStrand plans. Start with offline core features and scale to AI-powered storytelling with Pro and Enterprise tiers.

title: OpenStrand Tutorial Suite
description: Browse a multi-guide learning hub for analog workflows, deterministic analytics, AI augmentation, metadata governance, and DX/UX operations.

title: Tutorial: Start a Strand with Pen and Paper
description: Learn the essentials of creating a collaborative zettelkasten strand from pen-and-paper sketches to AI-enhanced workflows and team publishing.

title: Tutorial: Modeling Strands Without LLMs
description: Follow a deterministic enrichment pipeline—from statistical profiling to extractive summarisation—tailored for regulated or offline deployments.

title: Tutorial: LLM-Augmented Strand Workflows
description: Design prompt chains, queue jobs, and human review flows so AI-assisted strands remain auditable and cost efficient.

title: Tutorial: Metadata Architecture Playbook
description: Standardise taxonomy, authorship, and retention policies for strands and dashboards with reusable templates and governance checklists.

title: Tutorial: Developer & Experience Blueprint
description: Coordinate DX and UX workflows when extending OpenStrand components, tutorials, composer metadata, and dashboards.
